item.description:
The people have spoken! They want to go to Jamestown!

We'll meet at 10:00 AM at the Beavertail lighthouse (located as the southern tip of the island). It's the really tall building in the picture on the event's meetup page.

I'm not *exactly* sure about where we'll be pedaling, but we will probably take this route. It will be roughly 20 miles of street riding.

We're going to be riding on roads NOT on dedicated bike paths. Because of this I'm going to cap the size of this meetup and disallow maybes. PLEASE ONLY SIGN UP AS A YES IF YOU ARE PRETTY SURE YOU CAN ATTEND.

I *highly suggest* that you bring a helmet, sunglasses and water with you on this ride. You might also want to take a bit of cash with you, in case people want to stop somewhere afterward.

We'll be traveling around 11 miles per hour. This is about our usual speed.

If I get fewer than 5 YES RSVPs by Thursday night, I'll cancel.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the big lighthouse (at the very southern tip of the island) or try my cell (401) 699-7304
item.name: Biking in Jamestown!!
